caption: Everything was aesthetically pleasing with the decor and the drinks. The staff were super friendly and gave great suggestions as far as drinks. I had a fun and relaxing time. It's perfect if you want to be there by yourself, your date, or with friends.

Sugar Monk is by far the best cocktail lounge I have ever been to. The atmosphere is intimate and exquisite, and the drinks are of the highest caliber. This is a place for those who appreciate creativity, talent, exploration, and want to immerse themselves in all of that. The team is super professional and friendly. I highly recommend it.
Horrible service, expensive af
Outstanding cocktails and great vibe. Friendly staff and good service, too.
Love this place one of the best cocktails bar in  harlem!!👌

Beautiful cocktail bar in Harlem. We arrived around 8:45pm on a Saturday evening and the manager accommodated us. Maybe it was luck as someone supposedly just cancelled, however I’m not complaining :) great service and a lovely vibe. Jazz music, beautiful decor. I highly recommend.

Highest customer service I’ve received in a very long time! I can’t recommend this place enough! Came in without a reservation on a Saturday night when there was limited seating and the manager managed to snag us a spot. The drinks menu is superb, the little hummus platter was great. I’ve so missed during covid a beautifully crafted cocktail by a master bartender and we received just that. When we wanted one more drink before our dinner reservation (but could really only drink one more) and were planning on sipping/sharing out of the same vessel, the bartender unprompted split the drink for us and put it in two beautiful glasses with their own garnishes. We felt like we were treated so well and it’s a beautiful spot. We live uptown and will absolutely make Sugar Monk a regular drink place for friendly meetups and dates.
Great staff, amazing drinks, and BEAUTIFUL decor. Food is very tasty too!!

This is a must attend for a premium craft cocktail and upscale spirits experience. The owners and team are first rate. Even during this pandemic, you are guaranteed to have a high end experience at Sugar Monk!!!!

Beautiful Cocktail bar in Harlem.  Came here before hopping on the M60 bus back to Queens after visiting friends in the city. There is a red tent set up outside with electric heaters warming up the cold sidewalk, good selection of music played on a speaker and a eclectic menu.  The waiter was super nice and provided great recommendations.  The inside of the place is beautiful, maybe after Covid we can enjoy the venue.
One of best bars in town even though this situation 🙌

Serving up some delicious cocktails (thanks Tommy!). Strict house rules enforced sometimes taking you off guard and temporarily knocking you off your game when unprepared. In the end it sets things up for an enjoyable evening for everyone. Check it out!
So chic.
Did to go. Server was knowledgeable of menu and made a good recommendation based on my taste. Can't wait to stay post pandemic.
Great atmosphere and service Excellent cocktails
Fantastic cocktails!

Best place for Cocktails 🍸 in Harlem. Love the atmosphere and love the cozy feel. Atmosphere is beautiful. Appetizers are yummy and the drinks are superb 👌. They have up indoor or outdoor dining and should you choose indoor, the seating  is comforting. Would recommend you taste a sample of the new drinks as all have their own uniqueness and flavor. All are good for the mood you're in.
I walk by this place to & from work everyday & finally stopped in for Wing Wednesday & it was an awesome atmosphere & the wings were good with my Ginger ... I highly recommend this spot!!!

This place is AMAZING! First of all, the ambiance and swag of this place is literally next level. It is intimate, charming, and sexy - great for a two person date (I did that) or a Girl's Night Out or a catch up between friends! It holds less than 50 people, so it will never get too raucous for the evening!  The DRINKS. These are the BEST drinks I've ever had. There is a beautiful attention to detail that each cocktail has that is so special. My date and I tried 3 different drinks and had a total of five drinks consumed for the evening. And we didn't even touch the vast array of delicious drinks left on the menu. Absolutley Superb! Be prepared to spend $15 - $18 per drink! So worth it!  Lastly, the service was very inviting, kind, and respectful.  I felt valued by the owner, the bartending staff, and my waitress. The owner/manager made sure I felt comfortable and offered advice for choosing from the drinks.  Run to this place! A gem of a spot in Harlem! I'll definitely be back! Thank you for the amazing service!

Impeccable cocktails, rivaling cocktail institutions such as Death & Co and Clover Club.  The bar atmosphere, attention to details, and staff knock it out of the park.  A must visit for any cocktail enthusiast in the city, it'll certainly be worth the journey.  Easy walking distance to the subway makes this an excellent option for those located around midtown looking to escape the madness or anywhere off the A/D express lines.  Quick Summary: Excellent cocktails and bar staff.  A true gem in NYC.  January 2020 Update: The bar is still delivering impeccable cocktails from their menu.  While the menu is large (I doubt I could order all of the drinks), I'd love to see them rotate the menu from time to time to keep me excited for what's new (or a specials board).
Yasu God vibes
Great place, fun atmosphere and great drinks
Finally a high caliber cocktail bar in Harlem! Thank you for this gem!
Experts in their craft if not leaders in their craft- Without a doubt the best cocktails I have had in Manhattan
One of the best cocktail bars in NYC, and the owner is a great guy. Waiting to make another visit!

Sugar Monk is a hidden gem in Harlem. Every detail from the cocktails to the decor is thoughtful and pleasant. I can’t recommend this place enough. If you’re ever in Harlem, you have to stop by. I have come back multiple times and it’s consistently excellent service. Milan the bartender is amazing!
Seriously crafted drinks warm jazz lounge vibe.... Did I mention the cocktails are really really good!?!?
GREAT EXPERIENCE!!!
Happy to have more great cocktail options uptown.
Gorgeous space - intimate with beautiful decor. Thoughtful service and great drinks

Best Cocktail bar in NY for me. Had been a fan since their previous place (Second Floor on Clinton) and was very excited when the Monk opened. A visit at Sugar Monk is an artistic experience. The background story of their cocktails, their inspirations and the details in the room, make this place so unique.
Everything was perfect. Sexy design, gregarious service, delicious.

My buddies and I go there to catch up. I love the Speak Easy feel of the place - dark and cozy. The drink preparation is very elaborate and delicious. The 2 bartenders are very friendly. Queen of the Desert is a must try.
Great cocktails place
Very classy and professional. The cocktails were all very well made and tasty!

This place is an interesting edition to Harlem. The menu is very long and extensive in experimentation of different libations, all cocktails average about 16-18 dollars which is super pricy but it is a spot to start or end your night with one round. Everyone who works there rules, super friendly and helpful.
Great speak easy feel. Artisan cocktails. Great atmosphere

What can I say about this place. The drinks are amazing and are handcrafted. The bartenders are very knowledgeable and willing to give recommendations based on your preferences. The place gets pretty busy just so you know. Will definitely frequent this neighborhood Watering Hole on a more regular basis.
Super cozy atmosphere. Delightful cocktails, and perfect staff recommendations for the indecisive patron. I live a full hour away, but will absolutely be back.
A beautiful cocktail bar located in the heart of Harlem. Chic, sensual and sophisticated. Beautiful bespoke decor. Amazing cocktail list with attention to detail. A true gem to enjoy and cherish.
Very nice place  good drinks  very nice bartenders very professional would recommend.
Excellent cocktails!!
Great cocktails
A nice speakeasy, delicious non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks. Professionals.
A hidden gem in Harlem serving elevated cocktails.

First time last night we like the place is sexy sophisticated laidback drinks are really good it reminds me of the drinks of one of my favorite place Barton G in Miami Beach. We met Hector the owner very nice guy we are definitely coming back Jess Beebe
Cocktails are craft, complex and delicious.
Truly amazing! Beautiful place with the most creative cocktails I ever encountered.

This place is special. Everything from the furniture, artwork, plates, silverware and glassware to the ice cubes and ringing the doorbell to be welcomed in lends to the lovely feeling that you are a guest more than a patron. And then there’s the cocktails and the food. The cocktails are fantastic not only to drink but to look at as well as watch being made by the bartenders, who are Pros with a capital P. And don’t forget the food. We more than enjoyed the olives and pickles, charcuterie and the hummus. Each plate was a winner. The hummus was so special we asked the charming owner for the ingredients and learned they have two different hummus recipes. The one we enjoyed had harissa in it but they also have one made with beets! when we return, which we will, we will order the hummus again and will be happy no matter which recipe is being served. We topped the experience off with the handmade chocolates!  I wish I took more and better photos but better you come and see Sugar Monk for yourself.
very discreet, classy, safe and serves QUALITY cocktails in a intimate and beautiful setting.  Do not come here if u want to drink Hennessy and turn up!
This is my current favorite bar. The drinks are super creative and super tasty, the staff are wonderful, and the environment is always lively but never too much. I'd recommend this bar to anyone.
So good and a very welcomed new spot

An adorable spot with amazing handcrafted cocktails. The dedication to crafting these amazing drinks is worth watching and also worth the hefty price tag. They have a literal book of drinks to choose from all different and all with infusions I’ve never heard of. Unless you are a mixologist of the same capacity you probably wouldn’t know have of the stuff they mix together but to me that made it more fun. The bartender was very helpful on deciding and explaining. Personally I picked randomly and I was not disappointed. I had a delicious spiced bourbon martini that smelled like Christmas. We also had delicious infused truffles one was champagne the other was tequila and espresso and the last was a Manhattan, yes all truffles and yes all delicious. If you happen to spot it outside the first thing you’ll notice is it’s dark and hidden with a large ornate dark wooden door. Inside it looks like you’re taken a step back in time, dark walls, soft lounge chairs, and beautiful glassware complete the aesthetic. This is an expensive cocktail bar but more importantly it is an excellent cocktail bar. 15/10 must visit
Tom is a knowledgeable tender. The cocktails are delightful and delicious. Nice dark spot in a torrid hot city

Great place! They have an extensive list of cocktails that are true works of art and delicious. The ambiance/decor is really cool. A lot of attention to detail-- they had good scented candles burning and hand soap in the bathroom also smelled great. It's the little things!
Great bar! Amazing cocktails. Great owner. They have Marina Ambromovic art. Yes yes yes

Beautiful cocktail lounge with intimately crafted drinks. The setting is a wonderful escape with impeccable attention to detail.  I'd recommend this bar to all my friends as they provide an extensive list of low alcohol and virgin options, each as good as the broader selection.

Visiting NYC- this intimate, romantic lounge was such a find! Every detail from decor to drinks so thoughtful and tasteful... We had the Marie Laveau, layered deliciousness smoked at the table, and the Blue Moon, with an exquisite Japanese plum. Feels local, but met people from all around the world there. Would definitely go back!
Beautiful bar with the most fantastic cocktails!
Lush, intimate, sexy environment + divine, mystical cocktails = perfection.
Magical!
